sentences.en: I can understand why astronauts find it difficult to readjust to life on earth.
sentences.cn: 我能够理解为什么宇航员发现重新适应地球上的生活不容易。

sentences.en: In the end you have to readjust your expectations.
sentences.cn: 最后，你需要调整你的预期。

sentences.en: It takes time to readjust after a divorce.
sentences.cn: 离婚后需要时间重新适应。

sentences.en: Jet lag is caused because the body clock does not readjust immediately to the time change.
sentences.cn: 由于人体生物钟不能迅速对时差作出调整，因而产生了飞机时差反应。

sentences.en: Let the system stabilize and readjust the carrier flow.
sentences.cn: 待系统稳定后,重新调整载气流量.

sentences.en: Pengjiang district has vast field for development as the government readjust its administrative districts in 2002.
sentences.cn: 2002年江门市行政区划的调整使生机勃勃的蓬江区获得了更加广阔的发展空间.

sentences.en: Recheck clearance again after tightening locknut . Readjust clearance as necessary.
sentences.cn: 拧紧防松螺母后,再一次检查间隙,视需要重新调节间隙.

sentences.en: Take a minute to readjust and try to make doing something you like your main priority.
sentences.cn: 这样人生就失去了意义,应该把眼光放远,多做自己喜欢和擅长的事情.

sentences.en: The driver's seat is too high, I have to readjust it.
sentences.cn: 司机的座位太高了, 我必须把它重新调节一下.
她们应当重新修饰一番才是.

sentences.en: To Readjust - Loosen lock nut on the adjusting screw.
sentences.cn: 重新调节:松开调节螺丝上的锁定螺母.

sentences.en: We are simply going to readjust her medication and see how things are.
sentences.cn: 我们要做的只是调整她的用药，然后再看看情况怎样。

sentences.en: We don't expect you to readjust the whole matter out of hand.
sentences.cn: 我们也不巴望你马上就把这运费率全调整得妥妥贴贴.

sentences.en: We readjust our price according to the international market.
sentences.cn: 我们是根据世界市场的行情来调整价格的.

sentences.en: We readjust our price according to the international markets.
sentences.cn: 我们是根据世界市场的生情来调整价格的.

sentences.en: You may find it necessary to readjust the wheels from time to time.
sentences.cn: 你会发现不时调整轮子很有必要.

words.tran_cn: 重新调整；重新适应；再调整

trans.tran_en: to get used to a new situation, job, or way of life
